channel.title: literature on Donald Jenkins is a writer and photographer
channel.description: Recent content in literature on Donald Jenkins is a writer and photographer

item.title: Turn-of-the-decade tribulations
item.description: My difficult start to a new decade, and the tribulations of the French healthcare system, which is still probably the world’’s best. Competent care is available round-the-clock in Paris, and rich and poor and treated exactly equally, which is how should be.

item.title: An amazing mixture of Roland Petit, the Corps de Ballet and Proust
item.description: A review of RolandPetit’’s impressive ballet Proust ou les intermittences du coeur : « Les enfers de Monsieur de Charlus ».
